bug.author: opencv-pushbot
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/4324>http://code.opencv.org/issues/4324</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| Hossein Khosravi on 2015-05-08 06:36 || Priority: Normal || Affected: branch 'master' (3.0-dev) || Category: t-api || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: Hard || PR: || Platform: x86 / Windows </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Important Optimization Problem</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>I tried the new OpenCV 3.0 RC1 for object detection. However the results were disappointing. I wrote the same code (with required changes) and compiled and ran on the same video and achieved the following results: OpenCV2.4: 20 Seconds OpenCV 3.0 RC1: 40 Seconds It means 100% reduce in speed! </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h5>Vadim Pisarevsky on 2015-05-13 13:06</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>- Difficulty set to Hard - Target version set to 3.1 - Assignee set to Vadim Pisarevsky - Category set to t-api </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h5>Vadim Pisarevsky on 2015-05-29 16:04</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>could you please specify:
1. CPU 2. GPU 3. OS 4. compiler 5. the output from cmake if you build OpenCV from source code 6. the output from opencv_test_core (in the beginning it should print all the information about your OpenCL configuration) </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h5>Vadim Pisarevsky on 2015-05-29 16:04</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>- Status changed from New to Incomplete </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h5>Hossein Khosravi on 2015-05-30 06:35</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>I used precompiled binary dlls Code is tested on Windows using CPU not GPU </denchmark-code>
